title: NBA, fans, Joe Burrow, Cam Newton
itunes:title: NBA, fans, Joe Burrow, Cam Newton
description:
Colin explains why the NBA will set the time when it's safe to come back, why fans can probably expect lower prices, why Joe Burrow will have a tough time if he goes to the Bengals, and why Cam Newton and Bill Belichick wouldn't work well together. Guests include Rick Reilly, Jaylon Smith, and Albert Breer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
